## Create an RStudio Project
1. **RStudio → File → New Project → New Directory → New Project**
2. Choose a location (e.g., `Documents/MC451/`) and a name (e.g., `journal_project`).

## Install the course package
```r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("SIM-Lab-SIUE/mccoursepack")
library(mccoursepack)
```

## Pull your starter files
```r
download_journal("mc451")   # or "mc501"
```
